Container.Name: Fireshare
Container.Overview:
Fireshare allows you to easily share your media whether that be game clips, screen records, or movies through a unique publically accessible link.
default username/password: **admin / admin**
This software is currently being actively developed on. As of this moment, only .mp4 / .mpv files are supported. Support for other file types is in the works.
You can change the default password by setting a value for the variable ADMIN_PASSWORD. If you forget the admin password, change the ADMIN_PASSWORD to something else and restart the container.
Container.DonateText: If you like Fireshare and want to support its development please consider donating. Thank you!

Config.Name: Videos
Config.Description: This is where fireshare will look for videos that you want to share.

Config.Name: Processed Data
Config.Description: This is where data generated by fireshare related to your shared videos will live. If this is not mapped, whenever you update the container this data will be lost and will need to be regenerated. DO NOT EDIT OR CHANGE FILES IN THIS DIRECTORY.
